products.title: Iron Man
products.description: Billionaire Tony Stark creates a suit of armor to save his own life and becomes the superhero Iron Man.

products.title: The Incredible Hulk
products.description: Scientist Bruce Banner transforms into a powerful green creature known as the Hulk whenever he gets angry.

products.title: Iron Man 2
products.description: Tony Stark faces new challenges and adversaries as he continues to use his technology to protect the world as Iron Man.

products.title: Thor
products.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is banished to Earth and learns what it takes to be a true hero.

products.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
products.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, becomes Captain America and leads the fight against the Red Skull.

products.title: The Avengers
products.description: Earth's mightiest heroes, including Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, Hulk, Black Widow, and Hawkeye, join forces to save the world from Loki and his alien army.

products.title: Iron Man 3
products.description: Tony Stark must protect his loved ones and confront his greatest fears when a powerful terrorist known as the Mandarin threatens the world.

products.title: Thor: The Dark World
products.description: Thor teams up with his mischievous brother Loki to save the Nine Realms from an ancient enemy.

products.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
products.description: Captain America and the Black Widow uncover a conspiracy within S.H.I.E.L.D. while facing a mysterious assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

products.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
products.description: A group of misfits including Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and Groot band together to protect the galaxy from a powerful artifact.

products.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
products.description: The Avengers must stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his plan to destroy humanity.

products.title: Ant-Man
products.description: Master thief Scott Lang becomes the superhero Ant-Man as he uses a suit that allows him to shrink in size but increase in strength.

products.title: Captain America: Civil War
products.description: The Avengers are divided into two factions led by Captain America and Iron Man when a disagreement over government oversight splits the team.

products.title: Doctor Strange
products.description: Dr. Stephen Strange becomes a master of the mystic arts and defends the Earth against mystical threats.

products.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
products.description: The Guardians of the Galaxy embark on another adventure and unravel the mystery of Star-Lord's parentage.

products.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
products.description: Young Peter Parker balances his life as a high school student and his superhero alter ego Spider-Man, who faces a new threat called the Vulture.

products.title: Thor: Ragnarok
products.description: Thor must escape from the alien planet Sakaar and prevent the destruction of Asgard by the powerful Hela.

products.title: Black Panther
products.description: T'Challa, the newly crowned king of Wakanda, must defend his kingdom and the world as the Black Panther.

products.title: Avengers: Infinity War
products.description: The Avengers and their allies must unite to stop the powerful Thanos from collecting all the Infinity Stones and unleashing his devastating plan.

products.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
products.description: Ant-Man teams up with the Wasp on a new mission to uncover secrets from their past while facing a powerful new enemy.

products.title: Captain Marvel
products.description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes, Captain Marvel, as Earth is caught in the middle of an intergalactic conflict.

products.title: Avengers: Endgame
products.description: The surviving Avengers and their allies must assemble one final time to undo the devastating effects of Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

products.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
products.description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe but must step up as Spider-Man when new threats emerge, including the enigmatic Mysterio.

products.title: Black Widow
products.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts her dark past as a spy and faces dangerous conspiracies tied to her origins.

products.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
products.description: Shang-Chi must confront his past and become the master of the Ten Rings to prevent his father's sinister plans.

products.title: Eternals
products.description: A group of immortal beings known as the Eternals reunite to protect Earth from their ancient enemies, the Deviants.

products.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
products.description: Peter Parker's identity is revealed, and he seeks help from Doctor Strange to undo the consequences while facing multiple villains from different realities.

products.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
products.description: Doctor Strange faces new threats and explores the mystical multiverse in an effort to protect reality.

products.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
products.description: Thor returns with Jane Foster as the new Thor and must confront powerful enemies and his own inner conflicts.

products.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
products.description: The sequel to Black Panther continues the story of Wakanda and its heroes in the face of new challenges.

products.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp: Quantumania
products.description: Ant-Man and the Wasp embark on a new adventure involving the quantum realm and face a powerful new threat.

products.title: https://cdn.marvel.com/content/1x/guardiansofthegalaxyvolume3_lob_crd_03.jpg
products.description: The Guardians of the Galaxy return for another cosmic adventure while facing personal and cosmic challenges.

products.title: Blade
products.description: Blade, a half-vampire, half-mortal, becomes a vampire hunter, seeking vengeance for his mother's death.

products.title: Fantastic Four
products.description: The Fantastic Four gain superhuman powers after being exposed to cosmic rays and must use their abilities to protect the world.

products.title: X-Men
products.description: A team of mutants with extraordinary abilities fights for the peaceful coexistence of mutants and humans.

products.title: Deadpool
products.description: Wade Wilson, a former mercenary, becomes the wisecracking anti-hero Deadpool and hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.

products.title: X2: X-Men United
products.description: The X-Men team up with their enemies, the Brotherhood of Mutants, to stop a mutant-hating military scientist's plans.

products.title: Spider-Man
products.description: Peter Parker gains spider-like abilities and uses them to fight crime as the masked superhero Spider-Man.

products.title: X-Men: First Class
products.description: The origins of the X-Men are explored as they unite to prevent a mutant supremacist from starting a nuclear war.

products.title: The Wolverine
products.description: Wolverine travels to Japan and faces both physical and emotional battles as he confronts a mysterious figure from his past.
